query:
INSERT INTO parentChildren (parentId, studentId, createdAt, updatedAt)
SELECT p.id, s.id, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
FROM parents p
JOIN users pu ON p.userId = pu.id
CROSS JOIN students s
JOIN users su ON s.userId = su.id
WHERE pu.name LIKE '%桂真%' AND su.name LIKE '%山田%';
